title: Assassin meta
body:
Is it just me or are assassins midlane starting to really decide games.. If the enemy zed is fed. Everyone dies no matter how mcuh armour you have. Enemy fizz... Kills adc then fucks with your team for 10mins in the middle of the teamfight.. Can we have some items for defenceless adcs??
Anti-burst??
Other than bt cause u can't always afford big items

replies.body: Says the guy who complains about executions in Aram.
Difference between being cheap and nasty and getting smashed by Assassins which Riot knowingly buffed with the reduction of Armor effects and increased cost.

But that's what drives the spectator scene alongside the "plays" so yer.

Rito no like tanks being strong, they find it too boring like I mean, it's not your job to choose what's boring or not after you've already made them a part of the game... but oh well.

Yeah I no like some assassins too, especially when they're fed. We shouldn't be forced to look for an end game questionably broken item like Zhonya to deal with bursts all the time.

Tanks have been buffed through the teeth lately tho... {{item:3742}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3748}} ..(not even mentioning the {{item:3143}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}}  changes). I don't think Tanks have ever been stronger

Here is my Garen stats last game: http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/104817683/200774848 

- 9/0/12. (KDA)
- 5.5K hp
- 2.5 sec silence on q
- bonus damage if e only targets 1 opponent.
- 300+ on both armor types.
- over 160 hp regen/sec if you take no damage for 5 seconds.
- Ult does true damage to last member of enemy team who got a kill on an allied champion.

I love playing Garen, but honestly he needs a nerf.

No surprise there.. Garen is ridiculously strong! The Warmogs and Spirit Visage combo are crazy on him as well!
Honestly whenever I have a Garen on my team I just think GG the game is ours straight away.
And I'm usually right. lol
Like as an adc there's room to make plays unless they have cc and a burst assassin that kills you as soon as someone locks you up

assassins aren't in ATM. it's a mage meta.
also, there are defensive items. qss, banshees, GA, supports can get crucible, at least 1 person should have locket, and there's always exhaust.
If an assassin gets fed, of course they are going to carry. That is the idea of playing such a high-risk, high-reward champion. But no, there is still a tank meta.
I'm saying there's no way to get away from a vi and assassin of some sort. You'll be dead 1 second before every teamfight breaks out

Assassins have become pretty big lately but I don't rly think they're quite the meta yet. Mages are still more popular (although a lot of mages are assassins too I guess).
Another ADC item would be good tho tbh cause I'm pretty damn bored of almost always building the exact same items on almost every ADC. There's almost no room for counter building :/
